column5: Welcome to Spring, TX! (North Houston Area) Modern one story home with elegant high ceilings in quiet neighborhood. Come enjoy your stay in our clean & spacious private bedroom. Queen size bed with closet and drawers. 5-10 minute drive to The Woodlands area. Approx. 35 minute drive to Galleria area or Downtown Houston!
column8: Spacious Private Room- 10 mins from The Woodlands
